Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the XLight skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your XLight lights, rooms, and scenes, colors. To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa App to link your XLight account and say, "Alexa, discover devices”. 

Light Controls:
- You can turn devices on/off, for example: “Alexa, turn on my Bedroom lights” or “Alexa, turn off the Kitchen lights”.
- You can change the brightness, for example: "Alexa, brighten Dining Room to 60%", or “Alexa, dim the Living Room lights”.

Color Control:
- offers possibilities to change or set colors with XLight Color bulbs. Say, "Alexa, set the bedroom light to orange"
- You can also control shades of white on your XLight white ambiance lights, from cool energising daylight to relaxing warm white light. Say:
- "Alexa, set the kitchen light to cool white"
- "Alexa, make the living room warmer"
 
Scenes: 
To control scenes, simply tell Alexa to turn on <scene name> in the <room name>. 
- "Alexa, turn on Relax in the Bedroom".
- "Alexa, turn on Energize in the Kitchen”.
 
In the XLight app, you can customize any scene, e.g. Reading, Sleeping, Game.
 

If you have any questions, please contact support@datatellit.com.
